General.Name: Kingcan Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Kingcan Holdings Limited manufactures and sells metal packaging containers and food cans in China. It also engages in trading activities. In addition, the company provides food and beverage canned filling OEM. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Grand Pavilion, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1 - 1205
